info.name: Wondrous Items of Phandalin
info.description: Trinkets and misc items discovered by the Heroes of Phandalin on their adventures.
info.author: Chris New

description.p: This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.
Upon consumption, you gain 10 temporary hit points and fall under the effects of the bless spell. Lasts 1 hour.

element.name: Celestial Nighthawk Circlet
element.suports:
Ranger
This circlet is made of wood carved with feathers, a small stone in the shape of a crescent moon is inlaid over the forhead.
Once per day you can concentrate on making a ranged attack. When you do, the moon begins to glow with a dim light. The magic imbues your weapon with Celestial energy and turns any hit into a critical hit.
If you roll a 20 when your weapon is charged in this way, you deal an extra 1d10 radiant damage.
Wondrous Items 0 0 lb. head Wondrous Item Uncommon

description.p: This pouch has been decorated to resemble a cockatoo and produces occational, soft, chirping sounds. The pouch can hold up to 1,000 coins, but weights 1 pound, regardless of its contents. It becomes bound to you when you speak it's command word. If the pouch is already bound to a different creature, that creature needs to speak the command work first to break it's bond to the pouch.
When a creature that isn't you opens the coin pouch it gives off a loud shrieking, audible from as far away as 300 feet, until you colse the pouch.
Objects placed in the pouch which aren't coins come out shredded or battered, as if pecked apart.
You have resistance to cold damage while wearing this cape.
